meanings.sent1: She wore the spiffiest dress to the party.
meanings.sent2: The spiffiest car in the showroom caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: His spiffiest hat made him look like a movie star.
meanings.sent4: The spiffiest house on the block was painted in bright colors.

meanings.definition: In a very stylish or attractive manner.
meanings.sent1: She danced spiffiest at the school talent show.
meanings.sent2: The model walked spiffiest down the runway.
meanings.sent3: He sang spiffiest when he thought no one was listening.
meanings.sent4: The flowers bloomed spiffiest in the spring sunshine.
meanings.sent5: The cake was decorated spiffiest for the birthday party.
